body.content: Project Bootstrap automates the tedious setup process for new projects by provisioning cloud resources, configuring pipelines, and setting up repo structure—all from a single YAML file.

body.alt: Architecture diagram showing project bootstrap flow
body.caption: How Project Bootstrap works

body.content: The system has drastically reduced setup time from 3 days to 20 minutes.
Implemented a multi-region load balancing strategy using Azure Front Door to ensure Bunnings applications remain resilient and performant across geographies.
Helps achieve near-zero downtime with auto-failover between primary and secondary regions.
Developed a GenAI assistant using Azure OpenAI and Azure Functions that answers team queries across Confluence and GitHub to boost productivity and onboarding speed.

We’ve fully migrated all Postman synthetic monitoring to Dynatrace. A Terraform module and Scalr pipeline were built to manage Dynatrace Synthetics as Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC), making it easier for developers to create and manage monitors. Currently, 37 synthetic monitors are in place, covering our production environment. Failures trigger alerts, and a central dashboard displays real-time status across all synthetics.

body.alt: Architecture diagram showing project bootstrap flow
body.caption: Dynatrace Synthetics Dashboard

body.content: We developed a high-level dashboard to give a simple, at-a-glance view of Digital's operational health. The large traffic light shows the overall status of all Digital apps. Smaller lights break it down per app, each with links to detailed dashboards. A live event log shows the root cause behind any status change. This dashboard is the go-to landing page when investigating alerts or reported issues—making it easy to spot and drill into wider problems.
1. The large traffic light shows the overall status of all Digital apps.
2. Smaller lights break it down per app, each with links to detailed dashboards.
3. A live event log shows the root cause behind any status change.

We’ve fully migrated all Postman synthetic monitoring to Dynatrace. A Terraform module and Scalr pipeline were built to manage Dynatrace Synthetics as Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC), making it easier for developers to create and manage monitors. Currently, 37 synthetic monitors are in place, covering our production environment. Failures trigger alerts, and a central dashboard displays real-time status across all synthetics.
